page.title: 19Biography.
page.content: Lord Mount Stephen. Lord Mount Stephen was a benefactor to Dufftown.Born in 1829 at 8 Church Street he died in 1921.He was a pupil at Mortlach parish school.When he was 14 years old he moved to Aberdeen.At the age of 18 he moved to Glasgow and eventually to London.He went to Canada and took over his cousins drapery business.He eventually became manager of the Pacific Railway Company which gave hiim the desire to establish hs own company the Canadian Pacific Railway.He returned to Duftown where he gifted a sum of money to build and equip the present Stephen Hospital.
